name: Analyze Airtable data with MonkeyLearn machine learning models
description: Every time a new record is added to your Airtable base, Make will automatically analyze its sentiment (positive or negative) with a MonkeyLearn machine learning model. The template uses this [example base](https://airtable.com/templates/sales-and-customers/expMR28Je36HIlrxw/customer-satisfaction-form-and-analysis).
